title: DJ Dara-Hit the Breaks 1993 [FLAC] (breakbeat hardcore) MIXTAPE
description:
This is a mixtape from the early NYC rave scene. DJ Dara is known as a drum n bass DJ but before there was drum n bass there was breakbeat hardcore. He spins them very similarly. This tape is from 1993 or so sold at a rave gear/mixtape store called House in the east village. I think this mix represents producers' answer to the then problem of the "toontown" phenomenon making hardcore... stupid. You will hear no charly in this mix, this breakbeat hardcore has teeth.
